actions.message:
```
!Help                   Lists available commands
!SendEmbed              Sends an embed message
!UserInfo               Displays the user's information
!ChannelInfo            Displays the channel's information
!RoleInfo [role-name]   Displays info for the role
!Slap [@user]           Slaps the mentioned user
!FlipCoin               Returns "Heads" or "Tails"
!GenNumber [min] [max]  Returns a random number
!Gold                   Display's the user's gold
!Gamble                 The user randomly gains or loses some gold
!Kick                   Kicks the user from the server.
!Ban                    Bans the user from the server.
!mute                   Stops the user from talking in the server.
!unmute                 Lets the user talk in the server after punishemt expires.
!Warn                   Warns a player.
!Clear                  Clears Chat.
!clearqueue             Clears Music Queue.
!Connect                Make Bot Connect to the VC.
!Leave                  Makes bot leave the VC.
!Pause                  Temp pauses the music
!play [The Song]        Plays music.
!Queue                  Shows you the music in line to play.
!Reconnect              Make's the bot rejoin the VC.
!Resume                 Make's the music play after being paused.
!skip                   Skips the current song playing.
!stop                   Stops all music from playing.
!volume [1-100]         Changes how the volume of the music.
!nowplaying             Shows the current song playing.
!AddTicket              Creates ticket!
!Close                  Closes a ticket.
!Ticket                 Opens a new ticket.
!meme                   Shows MEME's
```
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
This is an embed message.

One may add a description and/or multiple fields.

Use "Send Embed Description" and "Add Embed Field" before sending the embed message in order to customize it!
actions.name: Set Embed Description

actions.message:
To send emojis, all you must do is: `:emoji-name:`

:smile: :thumbsup:

actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
1. Treat staff and members with respect.

2. No religious or politics or controversial discussion of any kind.

3. No bigotry, racism, or hate speech of any kind. This includes the use of racial or otherwise offensive words and  loopholes will not be tolerated.

4. Please use the correct channels for there purpose. 

5. No NSFW of any kind.

6. Do not harass anyone or ask personal information of anyone.

7. No scamming. Scamming is a ban.

8. No DM Advertising. 

9. No asking for money for trades or any money at all. Or giving money for items.

10. Toxic behavior is not tolerated. See rules 1 and 3.

11. No spam pings of a user or role. And please donâ€™t cap abuse!

12. No self promo! Please do it in your own server.

13. Have fun!
